Class CareerCenterStaff

java.lang.Object
User
CareerCenterStaff
public class CareerCenterStaff extends User
Represents a career center staff member who manages company representatives, internship opportunities, and applications.

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class User

    isLoggedIn, name, passwordHash, salt, userID
